data.message: I get hacked all the time!  They took 3500 dollars out of my account but my bank got it back.  Finally, I sent my PC to friend that does PC security for a living so he cleaned mine out and now if some one tries to hack me it goes straight to his phone.  just got it back and the speed is great and so far so goo!

replies.message: Hi Cynthia. We're sorry you are experiencing this. We have several helpful tools you can use better secure your account and recognize attempts to compromise your information. To learn more about these tools and how to keep your account safe, visit Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2i9LpPG. -Hannah
